display_long_description:
Battle Orb – Mixed Reality Strategy PvP

Join or Discord server: https://mixrift.com/discord

Get ready to aim, launch, and dominate in Battle Orb, the ultimate real-time strategy game in mixed reality! 

Battle Orb fuses fast-paced PvP, smart tactics, and immersive MR gameplay that turns any room into an arena.

FEATURES YOU’LL LOVE:

- Real-Time PvP Battles – Face off in 2-player or 4-player matches full of high-stakes action.

- Physics Meets Strategy – Launch units with precision, angle, and power—every move counts!

- Unique Units & Abilities – Unlock, upgrade, and build your squad with special powers.

- Mixed Reality Arenas – Battle in your own environment and scale the arena to your liking 

- Climb the Leaderboard – Win matches, earn trophies, and prove you’re the best.

Why you'll keep playing:

- Fun for all ages with intuitive controls and deep strategy.

- Endless replayability from hero upgrades and team builds, arenas, and ranked competition.

- Instant action with fast matchmaking and rewarding progression.

- Are you ready to launch your squad and outplay the world? 

Get Battle Orb now!
